item.description:
The theme for this group is promoting your local business using the latest and greatest tools the Internet has to offer. Bring your stories, questions, share and learn.

Meeting agenda:
1. Introductions
2. Tom Church will be presenting his small business: Physiotivity

Physiotivity is a Muscular Therapy business focusing on improving your adaptability to physical stresses through the use of deep tissue, orthopedic, and sports massage. It is owned by Tom Church and has offices in Newton and Arlington.

3. Q&A
4. Networking

----
If you'd like to present your business to the group, how and why you started it (or maybe you're thinking about starting one), challenges, rewards... please let me know.

Thanks,
-arno
item.how_to_find_us: It's easy - we are in the "Watertown Savings Bank" room
item.name: Greater Boston Area - Small Business Support Network April Meetup
